newsitem.title: USA: New Castle County, Del., weighs restructuring plan.
newsitem.headline: New Castle County, Del., weighs restructuring plan.

text.p: A compromise is in the works for a measure that would give the New Castle County, Del., county executive the power to restructure county government.
The compromise would give County Executive Tom Gordon that power until the end of June, instead of the end of next April as originally proposed.

County Council President Stephanie Hansen said many citizen groups had a problem with the time frame of the original legislation. She said the council could not pass a legal budget without first getting state lawmakers to grant the county authority to change its current framework.
Hansen said the administration is willing to accept the amendment and hopes that citizen groups will also give it their blessing.
